column1: [92] The prohibition of deductions (negative limb) in Section 26 (1) may relate
to    outgoings  or  expenses  and  in  these  proceedings,  Section  26  (1)  (g)  is
“26(1). For the purpose of ascertaining the profits or income of any person
from any source, no deduction shall be allowed in respect of-
(g)  any  disbursement  or  expenses  of  such  person,  not  being  money
expended for the purpose of producing such profits or income.”
